column1: #text=Every few months when my hair starts to feel shaggy , I know it is time for a hair cut .
#text=Mom calls to make an appointment with the stylist .
#text=When we arrive to the salon , the hair dresser greets me .
#text=She drapes a cape around me to keep hair from sticking to my clothes , and invites me to sit in a special chair .
#text=First , she leans me back to shampoo and rinse my hair .
#text=Once my hair is nice and clean , the hair dresser combs it out , gently removing any tangles .
#text=Then she grabs a pair of professional scissors to cut my hair .
#text=She trims the ends , which are often damaged .
#text=Sometimes she will add layers into my hair as well .
#text=After trimming my hair , she uses a hair dryer to dry it .
#text=When she is finished , I look in the mirror , pleased with my freshly cut hair .
#text=I hop off the chair and remove the cape .
#text=After mom pays the stylist , I thank her and say " I ' ll see you in a few months . "
